• Get Started With dBank

    Getting a dBank Account

    Getting a dBank is simple and easy. Anyone can do it. Unlike banks, dBanks do not have any requirements. Anyone can signup and utilize dBank's services.

    Using The Distributed Web

    Learn more about the distributed web, how it's better & safer than the everyday web, how it can improve the quality your life and give you privacy once again.

    Giving you dApps

    Browse popular decentralized applications on the distributed web that pay users with the dBank protocol. Get paid for your content, your products and more!
